author: Special Correspondent
text:
SIVAKASI

Ayya Nadar Janaki Ammal College: C. Binuramesh of Thiagarajar College speaks on “Advances in fish immunological research,” 10 a.m.

SRIVILLIPUTTUR

Natchiar Temple: Andal tirukkalyanam festival; procession of deities, 7 a.m. and 6 p.m.

RAJAPALAYAM

Rajapalayam Rajus’ College: 43rd College Day celebration; D. R. Balakrishna Raja distributes prizes, Sri P. K. Ramasamy Raja Hall, 11 a.m.

KARIAPATTI

Sethu Institute of Technology: National-level seminar on “Research issues in next generation satellite communication;” A. Selvaraj, former DGM, ISRO, addresses, Pulloor, 9.30 a.m.

ARUPPUKOTTAI

Saiva Bhanu Kshatriya College: National-level workshop on “Research funding agencies and project proposal writing;” P. Sundarapandian, Principal, VHNSN College, V. Arul of Pondicherry University and S. Sudhagar of Manonmaniam Sundaranar University address, Conference Hall, 10 a.m.

KALAYARKOIL

St. Michael College of Engineering and Technology: Voter awareness marathon, Bus Stand, 4 p.m.

St. Michael Matriculation School: Kindergarten graduation ceremony; Rev. Fr. T. Bhaskar David, parish priest, addresses; M. Stalin Arockiaraj, chairman, St. Michael group of institutions, presides, Santhiyagappar Nagar, 10 a.m.

BATLAGUNDU

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, Annai Velankanni Matriculation School, Madurai Road, 6 p.m.
title: Dindigul engagements
